data.text: @TheRealNubian2 Nah don't insult children please, kids actually put thoughts together and try to understand when you talk to them unlike these mofos
@TheRealNubian2 And everyone is just done reporting it now. You all have the information. If you don’t want to do what you’re supposed to then we have nothing more to say.
@TheRealNubian2 While they’re struggling with object permanence, they’re making COVID permanent
It’s like dealing with children; if something is not seen then it doesn’t exist; if world media is hyper focused on the war in Ukraine; covid is a not killing people anymore.
@TheRealNubian2 Yeah, it’s very fucking real… I can’t believe they’re still saying it’s a damn hoax!!!
